com.ooyala.android.ssai

Class SsaiPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.ssai.SsaiPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ooyala.android.AdsLearnMoreInterface, com.ooyala.android.plugin.AdPluginInterface, com.ooyala.android.plugin.LifeCycleInterface, com.ooyala.android.plugin.SsaiPluginInterface

    public class SsaiPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.ooyala.android.plugin.SsaiPluginInterface
    Class implementing the requirements to plug into OoyalaPlayer
